Get the people YOU want

Working where THEY thrive!


Hover or touch each image to find out more.

Profile

Individuals are assessed to determine their workspace needs:

  • For their role, team, internal/external clients
  • Productivity preferences
  • Personal situation

This is reviewed against the company objectives and needs to determine those best suited to remote work arrangements.

Place

Individuals are assigned to co-working spaces based on company and individual criteria such as:

  • Close to home
  • Close to clients
  • Close to colleague

Pilot

Employees can choose to work full-time or part-time from their co-working space. Flex By Design will:

  • Coordinate bookings
  • Manage payments
  • Collect feedback
The pilot will run, on average, for 8 weeks with no ongoing commitment.

Project

The final report on the Flex By Design pilot contains:

  • Findings from the participant surveys.
  • Analysis of data from the supervisor focus groups and feedback.
  • Recommendations for the future use of Flexible Work within your team.
A business case with projected benefits for the Flex By Design enterprise solution.

The Flex By Design Advantage

73% of Australian employees value flexible working, Hays reveals. Flexible work is the number one benefit professionals want (73%) but just 45% of employees are ‘very satisfied’ or ‘extremely satisfied’ with their current level of work-life balance. An organisation that doesn’t offer flexible working options is now in the minority and this has an obvious impact giving companies with flexible work strategies the competitive edge.

  • Ability to attract and retain talented employees
  • Greater employee engagement and productivity
  • Benefits to the bottom line achieved through less staff turnover
  • Building a “give-take” company culture that values needs of employees
